Visitors stopping by Monday to Friday can keep their coins in their pockets till Feb. 1
01 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Tracy Holmes
With the start of November comes the beginning of three months of free weekday parking at White Rockâ€™s waterfront.
Through Jan. 31, 2020, there is no charge to park anytime from Monday to Friday â€“ and a message on the parking meters is quick to remind those who try to pay for a spot.

The decision followed discussion that included a projection from the city manager that the new rates would lead to a budget shortfall â€œin the neighbourhood of $400,000-plus.â€
